english: - lndependent . - next stop , the white house
Lndependent . - next stop , the white house
One third of votes went to the independent candidate
chinese: 三分之一的选票被这位无党派候选人得了。

english: They are , ideally , independent voters , that is , people who move around
chinese: 从概念上讲，他们属于无党派选民，即立场不明确的那些人们。
无党派造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: But it would be wrong to think the senator from arizona is simply pandering to them
chinese: 但是这位亚利桑那州议员这么做并不是为了讨好这些无党派选民。

english: My ambition is to enter parliament as an independent mp , but it ' s only wishful thinking
chinese: 我的雄心是作为一名无党派的下院议员进入国会,这不过只是我的一厢情愿。

english: Even as he touts the virtues of non - partisanship in oklahoma , he will be keeping a close eye on iowa
chinese: 当他在俄克拉何马州吹嘘无党派的优点时，他将紧紧盯着爱荷华州。

english: Otherwise their nomination paper either gives the description independent or it gives no description whatsoever
chinese: 另一方面，他们的提名书也可以表明“无党派”或者不做任何说明。

english: Both the non - partisan congressional budget office and economists on wall street expected a gap of about $ 370 billion
chinese: 无党派国会预算办公室和华尔街的经济学家们都预期缺口为大约3700亿。

english: The founders of the movement realized the need for an independent non - partisan government watch - dog organization
chinese: 创办“国家廉政运动”的人士明白到，国家需要一个独立、无党派的组织对政府进行监察。
